generatedTitle: why do i shake when nervous

extractFactDictList.question: How many physical reactions are there to nervousness?
extractFactDictList.sentence: One of the most common physical reactions to nervousness is shaking or trembling.

extractFactDictList.question: How many reasons does adrenaline help the body?
extractFactDictList.sentence: One of the main reasons is the release of adrenaline, also known as epinephrine, which is a hormone that prepares the body for action.
